channel.title: Amy Carmichael on Faith Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Amy Carmichael on Faith Blog

item.title: If 若
item.description: 以下是將賈艾梅 (Amy Carmichael) 的詩《若》重新排列，以對應並詮釋哥林多前書13章4-7節《愛的篇章》，讓我們對神的愛有更具體的了解。 原文出处在这里 愛是恆久忍耐 Love Suffers Long

item.title: If
item.description: This book was written by Amy Carmichael. She went to India to preach gospel. One significant impact to India was to release sex teen-age girls from temples.
